title: 210+ Goodnight Paragraphs to Text Her Before Bed

steps.title: Send her a romantic paragraph to give her sweet dreams.
steps.content: Send her a romantic paragraph to give her sweet dreams. Turn up the romance by sending her a paragraph to say goodnight. Write a loving goodnight paragraph to remind her of all the reasons why you adore her. [1] X Research source Explain what her love means to you and how she makes every dream you’ve had for your life come true for you in every way. Here are examples of romantic paragraphs to send to your sweetie. When the sun sets, and the moon takes its place, all I can think about is your face.🌛 I miss you so much, and I can’t wait to hold your hand again. Goodnight, my dearest one. I love spending the day with you because that means I get to play it all over in my head again when I lie in bed. The only thing that would make it better is if you were here in real life, too. Sleep tight, my love.💖💖💖 I know you’re probably asleep right now, but I just heard our song, and it made me smile. I can’t wait to dance with you all night again. I love you! I hope you sleep well, my darling.😴 Hey, love. I know you’re sleeping right now, but I need to tell you how much I love you. Nothing in this world makes me sad because I know that I have you in my life. I love the way you smile, I love when you’re being silly, and I love that you know how to make me laugh.🤪 Goodnight, babe. I can’t stop thinking about how I want to spend the rest of my life with you. I want to be there for you through thick and thin and inspire you as much as you inspire me every day. You make me want to be a better person. I love you so much. Goodnight. You are my dream come true and everything I ever wanted in a woman. You make me feel complete. I love every moment spent with you, and I dream about the years we’re going to spend together. Sweet dreams, honey.🍯 As you sleep, I want you to know that you’re the only person in my heart and my mind. Not a single day passes when I don’t thank the universe for sending you to me. You’re my other half and the love of my life. Goodnight! I feel silly writing to you while you’re asleep, but I feel like I’m in a rom-com when I’m with you. I want to write you cheesy love notes and live happily ever after with you.😜 I hope you have the sweetest dreams. I couldn’t sleep, so I started counting all the reasons why I love you.💖 There were too many, and all it did was make me miss you more. I hope we always laugh, smile, and stay happy together. I hope you sleep well and have a great morning! I just want you to know that you’re the sweetest, most perfect woman for me. You’re so good to me that all I do is daydream about the next time I’ll see you again. Until then, I’ll see you in your dreams. Goodnight. I know you had a long day today, so I’m sure you’re sleeping already.😴 I just want to say thank you for choosing me. I feel happy and confident, and it’s all because of you. You make me feel like I’m on top of the world. I love you, and I can’t wait to see you tomorrow. Goodnight, gorgeous. I hope you have amazing dreams tonight. I’ll be thinking about you every second before I go to sleep, and I’ll think of you the moment I wake. I love you so much. I think you’re asleep right now, so I want this message to be the first thing you see when you wake up. I love you so much, and I hope you have the most amazing day. I’ll see you tomorrow night. I know you’re probably asleep right now, but I needed to tell you that you make me and my life so much better. I want to be with you forever. I love you.💖 Sleep well. Hello, my love. I know you’re asleep, but I wanted to let you know that you’re the most gorgeous, amazing person. I would do anything for you. You give me the world, and I want to give you the universe. I love you with all my heart. Goodnight! You’re the only one who can satisfy my desires, fulfill my needs, match my standards, and exceed my dreams. I want to be there for you like you have always been there for me. I love you so much. Goodnight, pookie. I love everything about you. I love how kind you are, how patient you can be, and how you always go out of your way to make me feel adored and cared for. Thank you for everything you do, my love. I still remember the day that we met—it was the same day that my entire life changed. You’re the reason for all of my happiness. I love that you can make me laugh even when I’m in a terrible mood. I hope you sleep well, my dear.

steps.title: Give your SO a chuckle with a text that’s sweet and silly.
steps.content: Give your SO a chuckle with a text that’s sweet and silly. Sometimes, the best way to show someone you love them is to make them laugh, especially when they’ve had a rough day. Laughter not only lifts your mood, but it can also help the bond between you grow stronger. [2] X Research source It reminds her she’s with someone who loves her as a friend and as a romantic partner. Try out a few of these to raise her spirits and brighten her mood. I think we really have to move in together at this point. “Goodnight” texts just aren’t cutting it. Sleep well and dream of your favorite person (I mean me, of course). I love you, dear. You’re the cheese to my pepperoni, and just like pizza, I choose you every time.🍕 I love you so much, and I can’t wait to have a piece of you when you come over. Sleep tight, my love! I’m not patient enough for a long, romantic letter, so I hope you’ll settle for this text. Goodnight, my love. You’re the most important person in my life. Thank you for loving such an awkward, silly mess.🤪 You’re the best. Goodnight! All my friends are jealous that we have such a good relationship. One of them told me today that we look really good together. Part of it is because of you, but mostly because of me. Thank you for loving me. See you tomorrow! Goodnight, my partner in crime! I can’t wait to send you a thousand memes and funny videos tomorrow. I love you. I hope you have a great day. I don’t need a heater because the warmth of your love warms me every night.❤️‍🔥 That, and the 5 blankets I sleep with. Sleep tight, my love, and dream of our life together forever. Don’t wish me a goodnight because no night is good without you here with me. I love you so much, and I can’t wait to see you again. Sleep well, my sweetheart. You’re my guardian angel, my best friend, and the object of all my desires. Nothing can take your place except maybe a good night’s sleep. That’s where I’m off to next. Goodnight, my dear! I wish you were here to steal my blankets… and the rest of the bed. Even though you’re totally a bedhog, I love you so much. Sleep well, and know that I miss you so much! Our love is like a never-ending dance-off.💃💃💃 We have our smooth moves, our awkward shuffles, and our epic fails, but it's all part of the fun and laughter we share together. Whenever I try to impress you with my cooking skills, it's like I turn into a contestant on a cooking show. The kitchen becomes my battlefield, and the smoke detector, my biggest fan! Thanks for loving me despite my lack of cooking skills.🍳 Late-night snacks are not so delicious… unless kissed by you! But since that can’t happen now, sweet dreams are my only solace! Goodnight, Buttercup. As you drift off to sleep, remember that I’m always here to protect you from the monsters under the bed. Or at least I’ll try to scare them off with my terrible jokes! I sent an Angel to watch over you while you were asleep, but the angel came back sooner than expected, and I asked why the angel said, "Angels don’t watch over other angels!" I was going to tell you a joke about bedtime, but it’s already too late. So, I will save it for tomorrow. Sweet dreams and sleep tight, babe.

steps.title: Charm her with a cute text to make her feel lucky to have you.
steps.content: Charm her with a cute text to make her feel lucky to have you. There’s nothing wrong with getting a little cutesy with your goodnight messages, right? You’re my dream come true, and I hope I never wake up. I love you, my dear. Goodnight! There’s no one as witty, kind, smart, and beautiful as you. Just like bacon🥓, you make everything better. Thanks for being such an amazing person. ‘Night, sweetheart!🥰 You make me feel like I’m the luckiest person in the world.🍀🍀🍀 I’m gonna dream about our next adventure together. Sweet dreams, my love!💤 Before I fall asleep, I just wanted to tell you one more time how much you mean to me. You’re truly my soulmate and my partner in crime.🕵️🕵️ Hope all of your dreams are as sweet as you are!😘 I couldn’t let you go to sleep without reminding you how much I love you. So here it is: goodnight, baby. I love you to the moon and back. Until morning, my darling. Everything you do makes me fall more and more in love with you.😍 You’re my knight in shining armor🗡️💪🛡️, and you have no idea how much I miss you. I hope you sleep well, my love. I know that sometimes I can be stubborn, but I just want you to know I’m forever grateful that you’re by my side. You’re the best partner I could ever have. I love you.💕 Have a great night! Goodnight, my love. I hope all your dreams come true because you definitely made mine. I’ll think about you all night long.🛏️🌃 I can’t wait for our date tomorrow! Just thinking about you makes me blush.😊😊😊 I feel so safe around you, and I absolutely adore you. You amaze me every day. I love and miss you. Goodnight! The sunset tonight was incredible, but not as stunning as you are.🤩 I literally don’t think anything could be as amazing as you. I’ll miss you as I drift off to sleep. Goodnight, sweetheart. I wish we could run away and start a life together right now! I can’t imagine walking through the rest of my life without you. You’re the most incredible girlfriend I’ve ever had.💋💋💋 Sweet dreams! Now I know what all the love songs were talking about! 🎶🎵🎼I can’t think straight when I’m not with you. You were what I must have been missing my whole life. I’ll dream about you all night and text you as soon as I wake up! I wish we didn’t have work tomorrow so we could spend the entire day together.🥰 I miss you so much. I hope you get a great night of sleep and spend the whole day tomorrow thinking about me.😜 I hope you know CPR—because you take my breath away. 🌬️💨 I wish you were here to rescue me when I dream about you! 🛌 You’re my favorite notification on my phone📱and my favorite thought in my mind. I adore you more than you can ever know.🥰🥰🥰

steps.content: Sprinkle a little sugar on your goodnight to win her heart. Show her she’s the last think on your mind before you go to sleep at night with a sweet goodnight paragraph. Don’t forget to add your personal touch by mentioning what you love about her! I must be the luckiest man in the world to have such a special person for their love.🌈🍀🥇When I’m with you, I always pinch myself to make sure you’re real and really standing next to me. You’re everything I ever needed, and I can NOT imagine life without you. I love you, darling. I may annoy you, and you might want to kill me. I permit you but on one condition. Don’t shoot me in the heart because that’s where you are!💝 Imagining spending a day without you would make me question my existence.🫣 You always pushed me forward, even on the days I’m at my weakest. I cannot imagine my future without you in it.🔮 You're my happy place, and I feel the luckiest to be able to call you mine. Love you to the moon and back!🌛 The doctor took an x-ray of my heart, and he almost fainted. Then, I told him, don’t worry, I gave my heart to my sweetheart. That’s why it is missing. Goodnight, my sweet cupcake.🧁 As you fall asleep tonight, know that you have made my life so much sweeter. I'll be dreaming of your beautiful smile!😴 The reason I call you my heart is because you are…erm…my heart.💗💗💗 Do you need more explanation? I love you, honey. The countdown is on until we talk again tomorrow. Sweet dreams of funny memes and our next date!😉 You are my inspiration and the reason for my smile. I know that my heart will always choose you. I love you from every part of my heart. No mountain between us is high enough to ever come between us.⛰️Now close those pretty eyes and get some rest, my doll!😍 Hey, cutie! Just wanted to say that you make my heart skip a beat and my face lights up with a single thought of you. When you came into my life, I left all my past behind me. I love this newly found love that makes me feel like everything is brand new, my sugar. I adore you so much.💖💖💖 Twinkle twinkle, my shining star,🌟 time to rest from near and far. Dream a dream and slumber through the night.🛏️ I can’t wait to talk tomorrow, sweetie pie! As you snuggle into bed tonight, I hope you feel how much I wish I could snuggle you too. steps.title: Shower your love on your far-away sweetie with the perfect goodnight text.
steps.content: Shower your love on your far-away sweetie with the perfect goodnight text. If you’re in a long-distance relationship, it’s even more important to let your sweetie know how much you love them. Checking in regularly with a nightly message can help you stay connected when you live so far apart. [4] X Research source Try one of the following goodnights if you need a way to tell your long-distance sweetie you can’t wait to see her again. You’re the most amazing woman I’ve ever met, and every moment I spend with you is a blessing. Even though we’re apart, every goodnight to you is a gift I’ll always cherish.💝 Sweet dreams, pretty lady. As the moon shines through your window, know that my love for you shines just as bright.🌛 💘 Know that I’m always there for you, even when we’re apart. I love you. Sleep well. You’re always in my thoughts and my heart, even when we’re apart. Your presence lights up my life every day, even when you’re miles away. Have the most peaceful sleep, my love. Goodnight! Every night, I’m so grateful that you’re in my life. Being with you is like a dream I never want to end. I can’t wait to see you soon. Sleep tight, my dear. You’re the reason I believe in fairytales and happy endings. I can’t wait to ride off into the sunset together. When we finally meet, I’m going to hug you and never let you go. Goodnight, my sweet. Goodnight, my soulmate. Distance means nothing because you are my everything. I can’t imagine my life without you. I love you, and I can’t wait to come home to you. Loving you has been the best decision I’ve made in life because you bring so much happiness and joy to my life.🥲 If I had a penny for every time I thought of you, I’d be on the next flight to see you. I love you. I hope you sleep well! During our video calls, I can’t help but stop and stare. You’re just so sweet, cute, and incredibly kind. I can’t wait to jump into your arms when we meet again. I love you so much. Goodnight, darling. Sleeping without you by my side is hard, but the time will come when we don’t have to text goodnight anymore. Until then, let’s meet in our dreams. Goodnight, my love. Falling in love with you was the easiest thing on earth, and being apart from you is the hardest thing I’ve ever had to do. If I could teleport, I’d be in your arms now. Dream of me tonight and always, my love. Goodnight. No matter how much time passes, how much distance there is between us, I will always find my way back to you. I love you in every universe. I hope you sleep well. Sweet dreams, my love. As long as you’re in my heart and I’m in yours, there’s no distance that our love can’t travel. Every moment without you is just another moment I have to wait for you. Thank you for never giving up on me. Goodnight. Goodnight, my darling! Just wanted to let you know that I woke up with you on my mind. I wish I could be right there, snuggled up next to you. Having you in my life is a gift I treasure every single day. I love you.💝 Distance gives us a reason to love harder (and to rack up those frequent flier miles).🛬 I hope I’ll be in your dreams tonight—you’ll definitely be in mine. I love you and miss you, baby. Sleep well. Goodnight, my love. I just wanted to let you know that you are the most gorgeous star in the sky. You are my guiding light and why I wake up every day, even though we’re so far apart. I love you. Distance may separate us, but my love for you knows no bounds. Can't wait to be in your arms again! Night, night! Even though you’re not with me right now, I want you to know that I carry you with me wherever I go. I think every day about how incredibly amazing life is to give me someone as special as you. steps.title: Send her an adorable message to make her smile.
steps.content: Send her an adorable message to make her smile. There’s something so special about getting a sweet, unexpected goodnight message from the one you love. It can save a not-so-great day or make her good day even better. So, send her one of these upbeat texts to give her something to smile about as she drifts off to sleep. I love you more than pizza, and that's saying something! I'd share my last slice with you, but only if you promise not to judge me for the ridiculous amount of toppings I pile on.🍕 Let's face it; we're the most adorable, dorky couple on the planet.🤓🤓 We may not have a romantic story like Romeo and Juliet, but I'm pretty sure they didn't share inside jokes and snort-laugh like we do! Not to mention that ending… Mathematicians would have been correct if they had said, “You plus me equals Perfect Love.” Isn’t that what we are? Thanks for being mine. I’m obsessed with you. But, like, in a cute way. Totally not creepy. Goodnight, sweetie! If you decide to blow a flying kiss at me, I am not responsible for what happens next. Well, it clearly is not in my hands. That’s what you do to me, just every time. Is it weird that I measure each day’s worth by how much closer it brings me to the next goodnight kiss? If so, I’m happy to be the weirdest guy you know! They say love makes you do crazy things, and I can vouch for that! I mean, who else would willingly watch "romantic" movies with you, pretending not to cry, while secretly shedding a tear behind a box of tissues?🥹 Hope you have the best day ever! Goodnight, my love, and may all your dreams be as wonderful as you are. Please don’t dream about me snoring again. My ego can’t handle it. Wow! I am 101% in love with you. Can I be so bold as to invite you to study with me on Saturday afternoon and after, invite you to go to the movies and then, invite you to dinner and then, invite you to go dancing and then, if you aren’t tired of my lack of objectivity, ask you for a kiss? Please shorten the process by giving me this kiss at once! Goodnight, my love. I rarely remember my dreams, but the ones I do always have you! So here is hoping for unforgettable nights. You are my lucky charm, my rabbit's foot, my four-leaf clover.💖🐇🍀 With you by my side, I feel like I could win the lottery, even if I never buy a ticket! If you dream of a giant spider🕷️😮, remember it’s probably just me crawling into bed with you. Don’t worry, I won’t bite…but I will wrap you up in the web of my love.🕸️❤️ You should know that I think about you more than I think about my favorite food. And that’s saying something. May your dreams be as sweet as you and as weird as the ones I have after eating too much cheese. I still cannot believe that you and I are together! What? Is this a dream? Call me back to confirm (and so that I can say goodnight).

steps.title: Be honest and sincere when sharing your true feelings.
steps.content: Be honest and sincere when sharing your true feelings. One of the most important ways to write a meaningful goodnight paragraph is to be as sincere about your feelings as you can. Tell her everything you love about her and the effect her love has had on your life. [7] X Research source Express your feelings, but don’t make your message all about you. Focus on her and use the word “you” often to make her feel loved and special. Make your paragraph as long as you need to tell her everything in your heart. Never write any criticism in your letter, even if it’s to say her flaws don’t matter to you. Really work to express how much she and her love mean to you.

steps.title: Use memories of times you’ve spent together to make it meaningful.
steps.content: Use memories of times you’ve spent together to make it meaningful. Let her know that you notice details about the times you’ve spent together. Mention some of your happiest moments to show her how grateful you are for her presence in your life. Tell her that her love and support make you stronger and better, even when things get hard. [8] X Research source Talk about how your life changed for the better after you met her. Reminisce about what she was like when you first met. Tell her what it was about her that first caught your eye. Keep things tasteful and romantic when you talk about her appearance so she knows it’s not the only thing you remember about meeting her.

steps.title: End your paragraph with a closing line that’s hopeful and positive.
steps.content: End your paragraph with a closing line that’s hopeful and positive. When closing your goodnight paragraph, leave it on a high note with a line sums up what you’ve said about her in the letter. [9] X Research source If you haven’t wished her a “goodnight” yet, this is the perfect time to do that. You don’t have to use a plain goodnight, though. Here are a few other sweet ways to say goodnight to your sweetheart. “Sleep tight, my love.” “Sweet dreams, my one and only.” “Goodnight until the stars fade, my dear one.” “May your dreams be filled with us, darling.” “Sending you love through the night.” “Goodnight, my precious one.”

steps.title: Why is it important to say goodnight?
steps.content: Why is it important to say goodnight? Relationship rituals, like saying goodnight, can help you bond and make your connection to each other stronger. It also helps you and your significant other feel more satisfied with your relationship. It’s a way to share intimacy and affection whether you’re in the same room or across the country. [10] X Research source A relationship ritual should always be a positive thing that you both look forward to, so always focus on the good things in your goodnight messages. Relationship rituals are often significant because they’re a sign of a happy partnership.

steps.title: How often should I send a goodnight paragraph to my girlfriend?
steps.content: How often should I send a goodnight paragraph to my girlfriend? There’s no right or wrong answer for how often you should send a goodnight paragraph. It can be a special thing for when she goes out of town or an adorable nightly ritual that you send even when she’s snuggled in next to you. [11] X Research source Once you set a pattern, it’s important to keep it up or communicate with your girlfriend or significant other if you aren’t able to continue at the same pace. Randomly skipping a night can make your significant other worry about you or that you no longer feel the same about them.

steps.title: Should I send a goodnight paragraph to my crush?
steps.content: Should I send a goodnight paragraph to my crush? There’s nothing wrong with sending a goodnight message to your crush. The most important thing is to send a message you feel comfortable with. Think about whether you want to flirt a little via text or you’re ready to confess how you feel . It might be worth it to talk it over with your friends if you aren’t sure what you want to do. [12] X Research source It may help to drop a few hints that you like her more than a friend before sending her an emotional goodnight message. Try writing out what you want to say before you send the text so you can choose your words carefully and say exactly what you want.

steps.title: How do I know if my goodnight paragraph for her is well-received?
steps.content: How do I know if my goodnight paragraph for her is well-received? One of the easiest ways to know if your goodnight text was well-received is that you get a sweet goodnight text back! However, if you sent your goodnight paragraph out of the blue, she may not be able to respond right away. She might even be asleep already! If you’ve been texting with a girl you like , it’s more likely that she’ll respond within a minute or 2. Don’t worry if it takes her longer than a minute or 2 for her to respond. She might be writing a reply or not able to text back.
